publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2419 Tommy Sheridan: Incompetence of the North Glasgow University Hospitals NHS Trust-That the Parliament notes North Glasgow University Hospitals NHS Trust's incompetent handling of the 16-month-long medical secretaries' dispute, the relocation of the Stobhill Hospital and the mismanagement of the Beatson Oncology Unit; expresses its deepest concern over the conduct of the Trust board, and calls for a full inquiry to be conducted as soon as possible.
S1M-2419 Incompetence of the North Glasgow University Hospitals NHS Trust (lodged on 7 November 2001) Dorothy-Grace Elder*
